document.full_text: british singer cheryl cole's replacement on the much-hyped u.s. version of "the x factor" was confirmed on monday, ending almost two weeks of rumor and speculation about the line-up.
document.title: cole out of u.s. "x factor"; accent not to blame
lines_and_colors: british singer cheryl cole's replacement on the much-hyped u.s. version of "the x factor" was confirmed on monday, ending almost two weeks of rumor and speculation about the line-up.
